pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Preparing for the Meeting</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Now letâ€™s go to work on your Value Map for Sunnydale Psychiatry before your talk with Dr. Bennett. Think about what you know about Sunnydale Psychiatry and select all of the columns from the Value Map which you feel most apply to the practice: </welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. New Options
B. More Education
C. Better Patient Outcomes

pageContent.summary: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">You know that Dr. Bennett is concerned with achieving positive patient outcomes and addressing or controlling side effects. These priorities are about better outcomes.</welcomeText>
